review_data.title: Fantastic Indian food in Zurich
review_data.content: Tucked away from hustle of Zurich, this little Indian eatery. Food tasted home made and service reflected warm Indian hospitality. Nothing to complain on food or servlice. Highly recommended if you like Indian food. Good, simple, authentic food that makes you feel at home.

review_data.title: Authentic indian food

review_data.title: Amazing restaurant with great service and food

review_data.title: Great taste
review_data.content: Best food by chef Hassan. Good taste of food. Especially thali. Keep it up and thumbs up. We had chicken and mutton biryani. Excellent taste. Ambiance is also very good. Hospitality is also very good.

review_data.title: Good Food & Service
review_data.content: The food was good in quality and taste with a nice substantial portion. All dishes are served with rice. Punjabi taste food as liked by Delhiites. Mr. Jagar Singh gave impressive services. Keep it up!! Rgds Mohit Jain

review_data.title: Good food, tasty veg biryani

review_data.title: Very good Indian

review_data.title: Good curry, no tandoori!

review_data.title: Nice Indian Food in Zürich

review_data.title: The food are reheated and expensive

review_data.title: Budget Restaurant
